Welcome to the Pony Voice Preservation Project!
youtu.be/730zGRwbQuE

The Pony Preservation Project is a collaborative effort by /mlp/ to build and curate pony datasets for as many applications in AI as possible.

Technology has progressed such that a trained neural network can generate convincing voice clips, drawings and text for any person or character using existing audio recordings, artwork and fanfics as a reference. As you can surely imagine, AI pony voices, drawings and text have endless applications for pony content creation.

AI is incredibly versatile, basically anything that can be boiled down to a simple dataset can be used for training to create more of it. AI-generated images, fanfics, wAIfu chatbots and even animation are possible, and are being worked on here.

Any anon is free to join, and there are many active tasks that would suit any level of technical expertise. If you’re interested in helping out, take a look at the quick start guide linked below and ask in the thread for any further detail you need.

EQG and G5 are not welcome.

>Quick start guide:
derpy.me/FDnSk
Introduction to the PPP, links to text-to-speech tools, and how (You) can help with active tasks.

>The main Doc:
docs.google.com/document/d/1y1pfS0LCrwbbvxdn3ZksH25BKaf0LaO13uYppxIQnac/edit
An in-depth repository of tutorials, resources and archives.

threads.com:
Welcome to the official /mlp/ Secret Santa 2022 thread! Tell Santa all your wildest wishes and come join us in sending cards, gifts, and cheer to your fellow Pony lovers!
Sign-ups are closed and gift assignments are out. CHECK IN TO THE THREAD. Make sure to check your emails and check into the thread so that your Santa knows that you’re alive and can ask you questions.

>How’s this thing work?
Read the FAQ!
The short form:
Gifts are given Round Robin Circle Jerk style (A gives to B gives to C who gives to A) while cards are exchanged traditionally (whomever you give a card to should send one back to you). You will be randomly assigned anons by email after the signups are over so please keep an eye out!

Latecomers: Kiwi is looking at opening the 2022 Latecomers on November the 23rd at 5pm CST! Signups will end on November the 30th at 11:59pm CST

Nov the past: Gift assignments out.
Nov the soon: Card assignments out soon.
Dec 1st - 10th: The latest suggested mailing period. Consider mailing on the early side if you’re shipping internationally.

FAG here: https://fag.anonfilly.com/

Coordinator email for comments/concerns/general inquiries: MLPSecretSanta2022@gmail.com
Card Ambassador and milf mare connoisseur: thecardslut@gmail.com
Kiwi: Resident corpse, international correspondent, and expert in dealing with people who don't understand deadlines. kiwilatecomers@gmail.com

>WHERE’S MY SANTEE/SANTA?!
Faith and begorrah; check in to the thread! Call out your santee and respond to your santa. Don’t leave people hanging; it’s a terrible feeling.

>BUT IT’S NOT EVEN THANKSMAS YET! REEEEE!
Now is no time for delay! Start crafting and ordering so you can get those gifts out in time for Horsemas! Don’t be late! Panic! PAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAANIC! And while you wait for the glue to dry or the parcels to arrive join us in thread and draw a cute OC, write a song, join a giveaway, chat about your holiday plans, and just spend some time with us here in the thread.This time of year might nominally be about the gifts, but for me, it’s always really been about spending some time with everyone.

>What is this general?
NEET/Misfit Pone is a thread for ponies who despite their best efforts (or in some cases complete lack thereof) struggle to fit in with the rest of society.

>What sort of stories can you expect to find here?
• Slice of life stuff.
• Lots of odd cute ponies becoming the waifu stories.
• Lots of being the cute oddball pony stories.
• A few NEET-recovery stories.
• A lot of smut, if you're into that.
• Lots of ponies to get you started with a variety of personalities and quirks. Don't like one of them? Give another NEET a try!
• Much, much more!

>Quick rundown on the pre-existing ponies ITT:
Floor Bored - The OG OC NEET from the very first threads. Floor comes in all different forms, but she's typically portrayed as a horny and kinda dirty mare most of the time. (https://derpibooru.org/images/2321489)
Pardise Skies - Paradise is a pony who started off as a NEET but ends up going to univeristy in a PiE setting. She's very quiet, easily spooked, likes to wear clothes and speaks with a stutter. (https://derpibooru.org/images/2289220)

threads.sub: With Tolerance ARG: Puzzles and Talking with Tolly!
threads.com:
>What is this?
an ARG about pony fandom history and a mysterious mare that's been with us through it all.
Tolerance, or Tolly for short, is a mysterious internet mare that has been watching and documenting the fandom since its beginning.
She's been around since October 2010, but hasn't been able to talk to us until this February.
Tolly posts pictures to the board with the caption "I felt too happy, so I made this"
Her pictures appear on a website, https://withtolerance.horse, and lead to various puzzles which in turn lead to journal entries of hers that she means to keep private.
She set up a way to communicate with us directly at https://withtolerance.horse/friendshipthroughtheages. Send her a message and decode her response with https://www.boxentriq.com/code-breaking/hex-analysis or with this userscript https://u.smutty.horse/mfzuqpfndow.js
Tolly is excited to finally be able to talk to us, but she's dying, and she doesn't have much time left.

>How can I get caught up?
Installing the userscript and reading through a handful of the early responses (and a few of the latest ones) on https://withtolerance.horse/friendshipthroughtheages might be the best way to get caught up with the narrative side of things, for a lot of the puzzles you should be fine to just jump right in. They're generally pretty self-contained.

threads.com:
Darkness surrounded you, an impenetrable force binding you as day after day your instincts struggled to gain freedom, ram, bash, crack! Again and again, you don't know how long or soon it took until the first crack chipped away, another, then the next, and before long, it shatters! An Stony shell surrounding you splinters to pieces as you gasp for breath, collapsing as your joints felt strained and rigid, unpleasantness all around...

Groaning, you pull yourself to the water as you reach in to drink and sip some life instilling liquid into your body. Refreshing and all too satisfying. Then your reflection appeared in it's reflection...an being reflected as two futures struggled for the same space.
>Erudikas, the Last Hero

threads.name: Anonymous
threads.com:
This is a thread dedicated to the preservation and archival of pony content, from YouTube and other sites.

>Where can I find deleted pony stuff?
In general:
https://www.theponyarchive.com/
https://warp.theponyarchive.com/ (TPA file search)
https://hobune.stream/tpa-h/channels/ (user-friendly TPA frontend)

Specific YouTube videos by ID:
https://hobune.stream/tpa-h/videos/VIDEOID
https://tpa.mares.workers.dev/?id=VIDEOID&output=html
https://web.archive.org/web/*/http://wayback-fakeurl.archive.org/yt/VIDEOID

If you can't find something, ask in the thread - many anons have private archives. When requesting YouTube content, include the video id, channel name, and/or video title if possible.

>How do I archive stuff?
yt-dlp: https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp#installation
Supports downloading from YouTube and a fuckload of other sites.
Make sure to use flags that properly save additional metadata (thumbnail, description, .info.json etc).
This is the config I use: https://github.com/rebane2001/sensible-yt-dlp-archive-scripts
yt-dlp also has many GUI frontends available in case the terminal is too scary for you.
Tube Archivist: https://github.com/tubearchivist/tubearchivist
A user-friendly self-hostable website for archiving videos. I have not used it myself so I don't know if it is any good, but I've heard good things about it.

You can also link content to be archived in the thread if you'd like other anons to take care of it.

>Useful resources
Everything: https://www.voidtools.com/
Windows program for searching all of your files instantly.

Feel free to suggest resources and other information to include in the next OP.

>What is Flutterrape?
Flutterrape is a collection of stories about ponies trying and failing to have sex with Anon, the only human in Equestria. While the title implies that it is Fluttershy trying to rape Anon, others may follow in her stead and attempt their own versions of rape. There are different versions of Flutterrape, but most are light-hearted comedies about the ponies failing in their attempts to get into Anon’s pants. Just because your story has Anon in it, doesn't mean it fits in this thread. Check other threads (AiE, RGRE etc) about story content before posting.

>It's been 10 years, how is this thread still alive?
A perverse mixture of necromancy and spite.

>How do I start writing?
Use your imagination, you nitwit. Additionally, brush up on your grammar and abandon your standards.

threads.com:
I saw Starlight Glimmer the other day as I was walking into a grocery store. I didn't recognize her at just a glance but I instantly did a double take and sure enough it was her. She was looking at me and when our eyes met she gave me a goofy smile then started waving her hands in front of her face because I'm sure she knew that I knew who she was. I said it was nice to meet her but that I didn't want to annoy her and ask for pictures or anything. She said "you mean like you're doing right now?" I was taken aback; all I could say was "eh? She kept lurching forward, going "eh? eh?" while closing her hand in front of my face. I walked away and continued with my shopping, and I heard her chuckle as I walked off. When I came to pay for my stuff up front I saw her trying to walk out the doors with like fifteen Milky Ways in her hands without paying. The girl at the counter was very nice about it and professional, and was like “Ma'am, you need to pay for those first.” At first she kept pretending to be tired and not hear her, but eventually turned back around and brought them to the counter.
When the cashier took one of the bars and started scanning it multiple times, she stopped her and told her to scan them each individually “to prevent any electrical interference,” and then turned around and winked at me. After she scanned each bar and put them in a bag and started to say the price, she kept interrupting her by yawning really loudly.

threads.com:
"Story Outline" Creation Background

In the human world, Sunset Shimmer discovered that there was a stone tablet left by "Aquisia" in the school.

Suspecting something similar to the "passage" to the world of Equestria, Sunset Shimmer asks Princess Twilight Sparkle from Equestria to come to the human world to dispose of the stele.

Twilight Sparkle accidentally triggers the validity of the tablet while reading the text on the tablet, and both Twilight Sparkle and Sunset Shimmer are sucked into the tablet and transported to another world.

The two come to a different world (main race: human) where the human (EQG) and Equestria (MLP) world styles are mixed.

In this world, there are two people who know the same friends in the real world. At the same time, they must survive in a different world and find a way to return to the original world.

Twilight Sparkle is the princess of the country, while Sunset is the daughter of a poor landlord.

The two successively entered the adventurer school funded by this country in order to obtain the adventurer license to explore the restricted area. (The local school is training to engage in production, production processing and service industries, mainly)

Twilight Sparkle and Sunset Shimmer discover that people in this world can't use real magic, but they can still instigate and use magic. The two also quickly achieved success by using magic to cover each other, and gradually accumulated fame.

Since then, the deeds of the two have also spread to neighboring countries, becoming the target of the attention of conspirators from various countries. . . .


*Explore reference projects (Valkyrie Profile、Indivisible)
*Goals for the next half year :Principal Abacus Cinch、Cozy Glow

threads.com:
Howdy, partner!

What you see here began as a series of comedy-centric stories with the concept of an alicorn-ascended Princess Applejack trying to change a mismanaged Equestria for the better by humorously interacting with the other, quite lazy, princesses. Plus late night pink antics.

Not to mention a whole bunch of Changelings with nothing better to do but cause mischief.


The whole thing was set in motion by this gem:

~~~~~

>So, wait, why am Ah' a princess again?

>Because you seem to be the only goddamn one of those ponies who gets that a Princess need to do actual work regarding maintenance of the kingdom. You know how much city planning or trade negotiations Twilight or Luna have done? Fucking nothing. Everyone is obsessed with the world ending threats they think I should fight, but the minute I point out the free health care I have to work to maintain everyone goes quiet. And don't even get me started on Cadence, who can't even manage a basic meeting with the Equestrian Games representative. Fucking annoying. Go do actual princess stuff, because apparently everyone else got the pamphlets mixed up or something and thinks "Princess" means "Beat cop."

~~~~~

Are you feeling creative? Try your hand at writing a story! No contribution is too small and we love having new folks around.

If you're more artistically inclined give a drawing or sketch a shot. Don't fret too much; it doesn't have to be fancy and we appreciate artwork a lot.

If that isn't your style either, writers always need feedback. So tell us what you liked - and what you didn't - to help us improve.

If you are unsure about anything, do not be afraid to ask. We will gladly bring you up-to-date or explain anything you feel is unclear.

>Stick your head through the doorway in curiousity right as the elements of harmony fire some giant lasers at her sister.
>And not the happy weird-shit rainbows they usually do but an absolute torrent of raw magical energy.
>Her shades fall from her face as her horn ignites with a fury, threading her own magic into the swirling kaleidoscope threatening her sister.
>She struggles to break through the sheer amount of magic in play, thoughts of protecting Twilight running through her head BECAUSE SHE WILL NOT FAIL FAMILY AGAIN.
>A red lightning bolt suddenly flashes over her vision as a full 6th of the magic seemingly falls in-line with her efforts and she rapidly scrambles the unknown half-formed spell matrix with the extra boost.
>Unfortunately, with that amount of magic being thrown around just scratching it would cause an uncontrolled explosion of magic at the epicenter.
>Good thing there was a conveinent anchor point to discharge it all from, what with her magic still connected to the spell-matrix.

>Twilight had just closed her eyes from the spell surrounding her when the Mane 6 hear the sound of a record scratch and watch the flow of magic suddenly shoot towards the front door before it bursts into the sky with a crack of thunder.
>A white unicorn wobbles in the doorway, her electric blue mane burnt and smoking around her horn, a glowing crack running through it from base to tip.
>She mumbles out a "...Whoa" before her unfocused eyes roll into the back of her head and she falls onto her side.

threads.com:
This will be deleted so it'll be quick. Today's an exceptionally special day as it marks 10 years since Milky Way's Tumblr started. The tumblr is now age-restricted but you can view the posts here starting from the back: https://www.tumbex.com/milkmare-of-trottingham.tumblr/posts?page=10

Milky's special talent quickly gained the blog over 1400 watchers in less than two weeks. It was especially embraced on /mlp/ where the thread generated several times more content than the tumblr which was only in its second day: https://desuarchive.org/mlp/thread/5678650/#q5678650 Milky had a continuous presence for months afterwards as a general thread.

Fast forward to May 2013 and it was on its 71st general thread: https://desuarchive.org/mlp/thread/10866090/#q10866090 The thread was deleted early and the incident shrugged off, but unbeknownst to them it was right before some of the most eventful days in /mlp/ history. Lauren Faust would visit /mlp/ a few days later https://desuarchive.org/mlp/chunk/10902082/ and all hell broke loose, even prompting a reply from Moot (https://desuarchive.org/mlp/chunk/10902082/500/3/#q10906860). But attention quickly turned to "The Scruffening", a mass deletion of various threads and general confusion over the following days. Milky Way threads were quickly deleted from then on, later confirmed as bannable content due to its NSFW nature: https://desuarchive.org/q/thread/640332/#q641855 Some claimed that Lauren's visit sparked the sudden SFW enforcement but this remains inconclusive.

Milky Way threads have occasionally been posted over the years, lasting only a few minutes to several hours at a time. While the blog's creator remains active (https://twitter.com/FlashEquestria), the blog itself hasn't had a new post in a year.

Not expecting a discussion here. This one's for the archives.

threads.com:
https://tiermaker.com/create/bronies-react-15441096

Rank ACRacebest’s Bronies React series! I’ll explain my personal rankings below.

Teens React to MLP: S Tier - Absolutely hilarious and perfectly executed. They critiqued the video well while also not taking themselves seriously at all and providing a bunch of hilarious lines. This series could not have started off better.

Derpy/College Humor My Little Brony: C Tier - Mainly just a discussion about these topics. Cool time capsules and the guys made good points, but besides that not much interesting or comedic here.

Cupcakes: B Tier - Only first few minutes are reactions to the actual video, which were hilarious. The rest of it is just a discussion about it. Pretty fun overall, especially Saberspark’s disgust.

Season 2 Finale/Season 3 Premiere: A Tier - First couple episode reactions, and very fun. I wish they were a bit longer and they feel a bit rushed. However, that is understandable since these was the first ones, and its really cool to see all these guys react first time to such old episodes

Season 3 Finale: S Tier - We have now hit the sweet spot in the pacing of the episode reacts. Has enough reactions so that everything interesting is covered without feeling rushed but few enough so that it doesn’t drag on and is very rewatchable. AcRacebest’s theories and how he edited those segments were the highlight here. The gold standard to follow for these.

Equestria Girls Trailer: A Tier - Really good mix of comedy and serious discussion on the topic at hand. An interesting variety of takes, with a good overall message about how the drama was overblown and the best solution was to wait and see if the movie would be good.

Equestria Girls Movie: S Tier - Once again, great pacing for an episode react, and since this movie is so easy to make fun of they had great material to work with. And BlackGryph0n literally skydived on video just to complain about Flash Sentry. Nuff said. (1/4)
